mapper.sql: SELECT b.id, b.name, b.category_id, b.class_id, b.code, b.m1_return, b.m1_index, b.m1_cat, b.reg_date, b.open_date, b.sale_date, b.can_buy, b.can_sale, b.min_buy, b.manager, b.favorite , round(json_value(b.fee, '$.Management')+json_value(b.fee, '$.Custodial')+json_value(b.fee, '$.Distribution'),2) AS fee, f.free_at, c.name AS cat_name, m.managers , r.y5_ms_risk AS y5_risk, r.y5_std, r.y5_sharp, r.y3_ms_risk AS y3_risk, r.y3_std, r.y3_sharp, r.rating_date , e.m3_return, e.m6_return, e.ytd_return, e.y1_return, e.y3_return, e.y5_return, e.return_date, e.asset , p.cash_p, p.stock_p, p.bond_p, p.other_p, p.top_stock_w AS top_stock, p.top_bond_w AS top_bond, p.portfolio_date AS pf_date FROM spd_ms_category c, spd_ms_fund_base b, spd_ms_fund_rating r, spd_ms_fund_return e, spd_ms_fund_portfolio p , (SELECT b.code AS CODE, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(jt.manager, ' (', during,')') SEPARATOR ', ') AS managers FROM spd_ms_fund_base b, json_table(b.manager, '$[*]' columns( manager VARCHAR(10) path '$.ManagerName', during VARCHAR(10) path '$.ManagementTime', is_leave boolean path '$.Leave' )) as jt WHERE jt.is_leave=0 GROUP BY b.code) AS m , (SELECT b.code, free_at FROM spd_ms_fund_base b, json_table(b.fee, '$.Redemption[*]' columns( free_at VARCHAR(50) path '$.key[0]', fee_r VARCHAR(10) path '$.value' )) as jt where fee_r='0.00%') as f WHERE b.category_id=c.class_id AND b.CODE=r.CODE AND b.CODE=e.CODE AND b.CODE=p.CODE and b.code=m.code and b.code=f.code AND r.rating_date = (SELECT max(rating_date) from spd_ms_fund_rating WHERE CODE=b.code) AND e.return_date = (SELECT max(return_date) FROM spd_ms_fund_return WHERE CODE=b.code) AND p.portfolio_date = (SELECT MAX(portfolio_date) FROM spd_ms_fund_portfolio WHERE CODE=b.CODE)
mapper.insert:
insert into spd_ms_fund_base
name, category_id, class_id, code, m1_return, m1_index, m1_cat, reg_date, open_date, sale_date, can_buy, can_sale, min_buy, fee, manager, favorite,
